title: Draw a Binary Tree
description: Given a binary tree structure, draw it using the canvas provided. The tree should be drawn from top to bottom, with each level properly spaced. Parent nodes should be connected to their children with lines.

examples.explanation: Draw a root node with two children
Draw a complete binary tree with 3 levels

constraints: The tree should be drawn from top to bottom
Each level should be properly spaced
Parent nodes should be connected to children with lines
Nodes should be drawn as circles
